review: Bought as a replacement for a Generation 1 PS3.  Provided all the same content available on the PS3 with significantly less power consumption, heating and noise.Browsing is relatively easy, though at times not the most efficient means of finding content.  Searching is limited to amazon prime as expected, would be nice to have an extension where it could search content across all available streaming services (only reason for 4 * vs 5)
